attributes.action: Introduce Biman Bangladesh Airlines to Manchester Airport.
attributes.additional_details: The people in the Northern UK/cities close to Manchester would benefit from using Biman Bangladesh in Manchester Airport. It also is good for the environment because it reduces pollution from travelling from Leeds to Heathrow airport, and is saves money.
attributes.background:
The only way to travel directly to Sylhet, Bangladesh is through Biman Bangladesh in London Heathrow Airport. 

We are petitioning for Biman Bangladesh Airlines to be available in Manchester Airport.
